name: aespa TOWER
description:
AESPA TOWER

Reach the highest of highs by building the tallest aespa TOWER with the members of aespa and the characters of their universe as the building blocks. Just be careful about gravity.

By: Frostmade

#This is a fan-made game#

📌How to play
  1. Drag the shape downwards out of the portal, and release it to let it fall with gravity.
  2. If the shape finds a solid position, it will freeze, and you can place the next one on top of it.
  3. You can rotate the current shape with the rotate button on the right side of the portal.
  4. You can view and switch to the next shape on the left side of the portal.
📌Important

High scores are only saved in the browser cache. Your score is therefore not transferable to other browsers or devices and is also at risk of being lost or reset accidentally.

📌Add to home screen on mobile:
  • Chrome: tap the three dots in the top right corner --> Add to Home screen
  • Safari: tap the box with an arrow at the bottom of the screen --> Add to Home screen
📌Contact
